channel.title: Revolution - 718/742
channel.description:
[CENTER][SIZE=6]Welcome to[/SIZE] [IMG]http://djweownthis.x10host.com/rsz_wm2545687.jpg[/img][/CENTER]
[CENTER][U][B]^Features^[/B][/U][/CENTER] [center] -Trivia Points/Shop -Prestige System -Mystery Box -Runespan -Fully working Farming -DonatorZones -Squeal of fortune with Rares! -All special attacks -PvP Points + Shop -AutoCasting -Working ArmourSets (Opens with Chisel) -Lost of Donator Benefits. -Recipe For Disaster + With rewards. -Minigames -All Spellbooks. -Working Summoning -Working Korasi’s Sword -Ancients -Staff of light Special -All Spirit shields(Creating & Effects). -View Stats -Bank Tabs. -Godwars Creation. -ItemBonuses. -Experience Lamps. -Dominion Items! -Money Pouch -Slayer. + Reward Shop. -and Many More![/center]
[CENTER][U][B]^Bosses^[/B][/U] -Glacors. -Jadinko Lair. -Ganodermic. -Strykewyrms. -Dagonnoth's. -Armoured Zombies (Training Area). -And more..[/CENTER]
[CENTER][U][B]^Links^[/B][/U] Client: [url=https://www.dropbox.com/s/u77pgxq4fmjroj2/Revolution.jar]https://www.dropbox.com/s/u77pgxq4fmjroj2/Revolution.jar[/url][/CENTER]
[CENTER][U][B]^Media^[/B][/U] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/z24NNwI.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/6oEB2LM.png[/img] [IMG]http://djweownthis.x10host.com/fastdl/game3.jpg[/img] Dungeoneering Floors [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/qG1FNHa.png[/img] Full Construction [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/XhHtDVA.png[/img] RuneSpan [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/rTQXNrC.png[/img]
-Added Prestige System with Shops -Added TriviaBot with Shops -Working on more things!
Prestiges 1-25 [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/1ii67Gj.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/mSKZyWq.png[/img] [/CENTER]
